name: Tokarev Pistol
skill: Deals 3009/3829 DMG to an enemy (healers priority).

additional_data.description: This Anima of a perfectly preserved pistol is no stranger to frontline action. She might look sweet, but with a weapon in her hand this girl puts the "miss" in "missile." Although lacking official training, she's a master in military affairs, and can go head to head with multiple trained soldiers and emerge with nary a scratch. Her only weak point is her slight lack in the stature department.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Obtained after clearing Chapter 2.
◦ Available in Jewel Summon after clearing chapter 2.

main: "Me? A split personality? Get outta town!"
skill: "You lot ain't even worth wasting bullets on!"
summon: "I-I'll give it my every last ounce of strength!"
limit_break: "Power wells inside me! Could this finally be my growth spurt?!"
